article: I was out late watching a movie with a friend in Georgetown.By the time the  _  ended,it was 2 a.m.We walked to my car which was  _  across the street.When we arrived,I noticed something strange-the doors were  _  .I took a quick  _  of the car and was relieved to find everything undamaged,  except for  one thing-my briefcase was gone.
